resources.string: This game works by tilting the device. Touching the screen does nothing during gameplay.
Now tilt the device to the orientation you wish to play in.
Use the arrows to move the fish inside the circle and press start.
Objective: Catch as many fish as possible before the ship reaches the other side.
Tilt device to move the hook and catch fish.
Return hooked fish to the boat to increase score.
Avoid sharks. They will eat all the current fish on your hook.
Be conscious of the ships position.
Hold the device level, so that the screen is facing directly upward.
Practice moving the shark around the screen!

Fishin\' Time is an android game application created by Dean Sponholz and Josh LastName. To avoid both, gyro drift and noisy orientation, the gyroscope output is applied only for orientation changes in short time intervals, while the magnetometer/acceletometer data is used as support information over long periods of time. This is equivalent tolow-pass filtering of the accelerometer and magnetic field sensor signals and high-pass filtering of the gyroscope signals. The resulting filter is called a Kalman Filter
